name: Physicus: Save the World with Science!
name_original: Physicus: Save the World with Science!
description:
Physicus: Save the World with Science! is an educational adventure game developed by Ruske & Puhretmaier Edutainment. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by Tivola Publishing.
Physicus: Save the World with Science! is available on PC.
